title: Katie Price and Kris Boyson ‘officially back on’ amid cheating claims
text:
Katie Price and Kris Boyson are back on (Picture: Instagram/Rex)

Days after Katie Price was pictured leaving ex-boyfriend Kris Boyson’s home, sources have claimed the pair’s romance is back – and he’s even moved back into her home.

The pair split in the summer amid allegations she had cheated on him with Charles Drury, a builder who was working on her home – whom she has now reportedly cheated on with Kris – but now insiders close to Pricey have suggested that the pair are ‘officially back on’.

Yes, it’s a tangled web Katie has been weaving.

Pals of Katie’s told Metro.co.uk that she knew she had ‘some explaining to do’ after she was pictured sneaking out of her ex-boyfriend Kris’s house after spending the night.

But now it has been claimed that Kris has ‘taken her back and they’re already moving some of his things back into the house’.

Speaking to The Sun the source added: ‘They’re officially back on – everyone’s shocked that he didn’t make it harder for her, but they’re back to being loved-up again like they never split up.’

Katie Price and Kris Boyson in happier times (Picture: Rex)

‘Katie was totally caught out’ with the pictures of her leaving Kris’ home sources told Metro.co.uk, alleging that ‘they’ve been in contact longer than they’ve let on and maybe bumping into each other at Thorpe Park was more a stunt than a coincidence’.

The pictures come amid reports that Charles dumped her for sneaking around on him with Kris.

Kris had seen Katie through several surgeries, and was close to all of her children (Picture: Katie Price/Instagram)

‘She lied to Charles,’ said the insider, ‘Katie was totally caught out.

‘She’s in hot water, they’ve been sneaking behind people’s back and it’s not cool.’

Kris had seen Katie through several surgeries, and was close to all of her children.

The personal trainer was regularly on her reality show My Crazy Life and was seen cuddling the youngest children Jett and Bunny, and helping Harvey to get healthy.
